name: Salmon Patties With Dill Sauce
author: tinalyn
summary: My daughter and I love salmon patties, and we found this version that is healthier than salmon patties made with mayo. Everyone I've made this for has asked for the recipe. I would love to hear any improvements and/or variations you make to this simple recipe. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can salmon, drained and flaked
sea salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
directions: Mix salmon, breadcrumbs, onion, Dijon mustard, egg, and lemon juice together in a bowl; form into 2 patties
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook patties in the hot oil until lightly browned and cooked through, 4 minutes per side; season with sea salt and black pepper
Mix sour cream, dill, garlic powder, and sea salt together in a bowl; serve alongside salmon patties
